channel.title: Help with connections
channel.description:
When i host, randomly everyone will be kicked, my internet stays the same. My webs are pretty fast 110mbs, but everyone just Disconnects out of pure random times. Please help. Cant get a picture atm of it, cause I'm not at my house, but i can still control my computer via a remote assistance thing.
Just as much, i am looking for a coder who is pretty experienced, and has a paypal [payment purposes only]
So..help please!
